original_title: 上司が出張で不在中、上司の妻とめちゃくちゃハメまくった3日間。
overview: A boss who has loved me since I joined the company. The wife of such a boss was very beautiful and admired. One day, when my boss invited me to eat at home, I exchanged contacts. The night my boss went on a business trip, my wife suddenly called me and when I went home, there was Tsukasa in a bath towel. "My husband has been having an affair all the time ... I shouldn't do it?" At that moment, I lost my reason and the weekend of having an affair with my warrior started.
title: While My Boss Was Away On A Business Trip, I Fucked The Shit Out Of The Boss's Wife For 3 Whole Days. Tsukasa Aoi
